New Records: Lionel Messi broke the all-time record for Copa América minutes played
Key Match Events: Argentina won the match 4-2 in a penalty shootout after the game ended 1-1 in regular time
Lionel Messi missed a penalty shot
Emiliano Martinez saved two penalty shots to help Argentina win
Jordy Caicedo missed a header that would have won the match for Ecuador in regular time
Kevin Rodriguez scored a dramatic equalizing goal for Ecuador in stoppage time
Lisandro Martinez scored the first goal of the match for Argentina with a header
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at NRG Stadium in Houston
The game went to a penalty shootout after the score was tied 1-1 in regular time
Argentina advances to the Copa América semifinals with the win
Others: Argentina's Emiliano Martinez made several key saves throughout the match
Ecuador's Jordy Caicedo had a chance to win the match for Ecuador in regular time but missed a header
